comments.body:
Do we need to handle similar fix for junos_template as well?
Also, require separate handling for load of backup config with unicode string.

A note can be added in the description to inform that this option can be used to confirm a confirmed commit operation.
Reference: https://www.juniper.net/documentation/en_US/junos/topics/topic-map/junos-configuration-commit.html
Check section: `Activating a Junos OS Configuration but Requiring Confirmation`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +125,129 @@  check_commit:
    description:
      - This argument will check correctness of syntax; do not apply changes.
      - Note that this argument can be used to confirm verified configuration done via commit confirmed operation
    type: bool
